title: I am not getting mastery tokens for S's?

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: {{champion:17}} So I got 2 S-'s on Captain Teemo who is on duty in normal games (blind pick) but I didn't receive any mastery tokens for mastery 7. I'm not sure what happened, I checked in loot and nothing is there.

replies.body: Once you're shooting for Mastery 7, the requirements for tokens become a little bit more restricted. To get Mastery 7 tokens, you need to get at *least* an S. S-'s no longer count for rank 7 like they did for rank 6.
